Player History
Was selected to the 2047 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/7/2047, off Cecil Santa (SFH)...
Had 600th career homerun on 8/18/2047, off Gines Abad (RIR)...
Injured on 10/3/2047 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Long Beach on 2/1/2048 to a 2-year deal worth $12,575,000 per year...
Traded from Long Beach to Patrone on 3/2/2048 (Going to LBL: CF David Kober, 3B Ralph Moeller. Going to PAT: LF Santiago Macias, C Richard Vierra, P Donald Rogers)...
Was selected to the 2048 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Long Beach on 7/29/2048...
Injured on 8/6/2049 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
8/25/2049: Signed a contract extension with Patrone, $2,510,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/9/2049, hitting .517 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 9/13/2049 with a Broken Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
Released by Patrone on 7/8/2050...
Signed as a free agent by Philly on 7/11/2050 to a 1-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
7/21/2050: Signed a contract extension with Philly, $450,000 per year, for 2 years.
